name: Tart '76 | DEVELOPED
description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, Graham, and folkart. 
We wanted to make a Red, White, and Blue themed recipe so this is our version of a  Blueberry, Raspberry Tart.  To add a bit of brightness, you can add FE Lemon at .25% and to make it a bit darker you can increase the JF Cookie to 1.5%. Full Development Notes at https://youtu.be/NR731Ylixe8

Our weekly episodes will be released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
author: Developed

reviews.text: This is insanely good. Not surprised that it’s a very well balanced flavor, given that developed comes out with my favorite recipes, but for a recipe way out of my ballpark in terms of the profile, I can’t put this down. It’s so good. If you’ve ever had epicus nebulas Blue General this is spot on to the fruit but also has a way better base. Keep em comin guys!
Accurate to the description.  Not one of my favorite dessert style vapes, but it was very good.
